channel.title: CVE Feed for Juniper Networks -- Junos Space
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Juniper Networks -- Junos Space

item.title: CVE-2019-0016|2024-08-04T17:37:07.561Z -- juniper%20networks -- junos%20space
item.description: A malicious authenticated user may be able to delete a device from the Junos Space database without the necessary privileges through crafted Ajax interactions obtained from another legitimate delete action performed by another administrative user. Affected releases are Juniper Networks Junos Space versions prior to 18.3R1.

item.title: CVE-2019-0017|2024-08-04T17:37:07.138Z -- juniper%20networks -- junos%20space
item.description: The Junos Space application, which allows Device Image files to be uploaded, has insufficient validity checking which may allow uploading of malicious images or scripts, or other content types. Affected releases are Juniper Networks Junos Space versions prior to 18.3R1.

item.title: CVE-2020-1611|2024-08-04T06:39:10.790Z -- juniper%20networks -- junos%20space
item.description: A Local File Inclusion vulnerability in Juniper Networks Junos Space allows an attacker to view all files on the target when the device receives malicious HTTP packets. This issue affects: Juniper Networks Junos Space versions prior to 19.4R1.
